channel.title: parted on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in parted on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: Linux Change Disklabel
item.description: parted 來手動改變硬碟為 GPT(或msdos等) [anaconda root@localhost /]# parted /dev/sda GUN Parted 2.1 Using /dev/sda Welcome to GNU Parted! Type 'help' to view a list of commands. (parted) mklabel New disk label type?gpt Warning: The existing disk label on /dev/sda will be destroyed and all data on this disk will be lost. Do you want to continue? Yes/No?Yes (parted) q Information: You may need to update /etc/fstab.
